dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3251325X] Illegal copys of our games, http://arabnokia.net/showthrea
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: Abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:Abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2007 12:46 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3251325X] Illegal copys of our games, http://arabnokia.net/showthread.php?p=7564723 ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. type="multipart/alternative"; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C75A6D.654EA91C" Date: Tue, 27 Feb 2007 13:47:00 +0100 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Illegal copys of our games, http://arabnokia.net/showthread.php?p=7564723 thread-index: AcdabV8dbHq76DbfRf2qyoB18TrdJg== From: "D Maslanka" To: Cc: "C Lohr" , , , , X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 3.50 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=3.50 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED tests=DEAR_SOMETHING, HTML_FONT_FACE_BAD, HTML_NONELEMENT_60_70, SUBJ_HAS_UNIQ_ID X-Barracuda-Spam-Report: Code version 3.02, rules version 3.0.35136 Rule breakdown below pts rule name description ---- ---------------------- -------------------------------------------------- 1.12 SUBJ_HAS_UNIQ_ID Subject contains a unique ID 1.61 DEAR_SOMETHING BODY: Contains 'Dear (something)' 0.45 HTML_FONT_FACE_BAD BODY: HTML font face is not a word 0.32 HTML_NONELEMENT_60_70 BODY: 60% to 70% of HTML elements are non-standard Return-Path: d.maslanka@fishlabs.net X-OriginalArrivalTime: 27 Feb 2007 12:44:46.0069 (UTC) FILETIME=[0F763A50:01C75A6D] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sir or Madam, Our Content Protection Team has reported that you are hosting a web site: http://arabnokia.net/showthread.php?p=7564723 offers copies of FISHLABS games for mobile phones. The making of unauthorized copies is a violation of FISHLABS rights under international laws and International Treaties. You have participated in the violation of law, or, at best, you have been negligent in preventing others from offering unauthorized copies of FISHLABS games on the internet. You are potentially liable for damages that FISHLABS may suffer as a result of this violation of law. Damages could be significant, given the world wide distribution of pirate copies over the Internet. FISHLABS is disappointed that it cannot rely on you to respect its rights, and will be considering whether further legal action is appropriate in this case. We hereby formally request that you immediately remove or ask to remove FISHLABS games from the web sites: http://arabnokia.net/showthread.php?p=7564723 and confirm us the same by email. This letter constitutes notice to you that your actions are illegal and may subject you to criminal prosecution and civil liability. We will be monitoring your web site to see if you are in compliance with the law and reserve the right to take all steps necessary to protect FISHLABS rights. FISHLABS Games on your side are: Burning Tires 3D, Cloud Commander 3D, Galaxy on Fire 3D , Heli Strike 3D and Motoraver 3D Regards http://arabnokia.net/showthread.php?p=7564723 Results of IP Tracking for 67.15.50.164 IP address 67.15.50.164 Hostname ev1s-67-15-50-164.ev1servers.net ISP Everyones Internet Country United States abuse@ev1servers.net noc@ev1servers.net admin2@ev1servers.net ipadmin@ev1servers.net Registered through: GoDaddy.com, Inc. 101 | Fax: - 110 Mail: d.maslanka@fishlabs.net | Web: www.fishlabs.net ________________________________________________________ MIME element (text/html)

Dear Sir or Madam,

 

Our Content Protection Team has reported that you are hosting a web site: http://arabnokia.net/showthread.php?p=7564723 offers copies of FISHLABS games for mobile phones.

The making of unauthorized copies is a violation of FISHLABS rights under international laws and International Treaties. 

You have participated in the violation of law, or, at best, you have been negligent in preventing others from offering unauthorized copies of FISHLABS games on the internet. You are potentially liable for damages that FISHLABS may suffer as a result of this violation of law. Damages could be significant, given the world wide distribution of pirate copies over the Internet.

FISHLABS is disappointed that it cannot rely on you to respect its rights, and will be considering whether further legal action is appropriate in this case. 

We hereby formally request that you immediately remove or ask to remove FISHLABS games from the web sites: http://arabnokia.net/showthread.php?p=7564723 and confirm us the same by email.

This letter constitutes notice to you that your actions are illegal and may subject you to criminal prosecution and civil liability. We will be monitoring your web site to see if you are in compliance with the law and reserve the right to take all steps necessary to protect FISHLABS rights. 

FISHLABS Games on your side are:

Burning Tires 3D, Cloud Commander 3D, Galaxy on Fire 3D , Heli Strike 3D and Motoraver 3D

 

Regards

 

 

http://arabnokia.net/showthread.php?p=7564723
